H0.text: what country did the battle of san juan hill take place. Puerto Rico

H1.text: what country did the battle of san juan hill take place. Philippines

H2.text: what country did the battle of san juan hill take place. Spain

H3.text: what country did the battle of san juan hill take place. Cuba

A4.text: The combined assaults on Kettle Hill and San Juan Hill that together form San Juan Heights proved to be one of the most significant battles of the war and, along with the Siege of Santiago, a decisive battle in deciding the fate of the United States Army campaign in Cuba.
